channel.title: [508] Making A Portal Tele You Palidino 76 [508]
channel.description:
2/10 Copying a code and pasting it :p
Ok start by opening ObjectOption1 found in: src\palidino76\rs2\io\packets
Once insdie search for something like "Dummy"
in our last tutorial we made a portal, to make it teleport us somewhere we need to put this:
case ####: //Where the #### put the ID of the portal p.setCoords(####, ####, #); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "####"); break;
Ok let me explain this code,
Case #### is the ID that you will be using for the teleport or other object p.setCoords(####, ####, #) The #### is the coordinates, the first one being the X then the Y and then the HEIGHT. p.frames.sendMessage(p,"###"); The ### is the message you put so when you teleport in the chatbox is will say something like Welcome To Wherever just replace the #### with whatever you like :) Break; Just to end it :D
Hope I helped!

item.title: [508] Making A Portal Tele You Palidino 76 [508]
item.dc:creator: @tomzyy11 tomzyy11
item.description:
@tomzyy11 wrote:

2/10
Copying a code and pasting it

Ok start by opening ObjectOption1 found in: src\palidino76\rs2\io\packets

Once insdie search for something like “Dummy”

in our last tutorial we made a portal, to make it teleport us somewhere we need to put this:

case ####: //Where the #### put the ID of the portal
p.setCoords(####, ####, #);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “####”);
break;

Ok let me explain this code,

Case #### is the ID that you will be using for the teleport or other object
p.setCoords(####, ####, #) The #### is the coordinates, the first one being the X then the Y and then the HEIGHT.
p.frames.sendMessage(p,"###"); The ### is the message you put so when you teleport in the chatbox is will say something like Welcome To Wherever just replace the #### with whatever you like
Break; Just to end it

Hope I helped!

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Making A Portal Tele You Palidino 76 [508]
